attributes.action: declare music a practical subject in scotland so that class sizes do not exceed 20 pupils.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Music in Scotland is not given the kudos of being a practical subject, even thought the subject has become more and more practical based over the past few years. Scottish teachers need classes to be protected at an upper limit of 20 to ensure quality learning and teaching.

Music is an important subject within the school curriculum and by ensuring numbers do not exceed 20 pupils we can deliver effectively the music curriculum to our students.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Music-Education/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
